channel.title: Yell while muted. need help. please!
channel.description: Okay when I mute someone they can still use the yell command. how do i fix this? please help me.

item.title: Yell while muted. need help. please!
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:
@John459 wrote:

Make this your ::yell command:

[code]} else if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5) {

        command.substring(5).trim();

        if (muted == 1) {
            sendMessage("You are muted and cannot use the yell command!");
   } else if (starter == 0) {
  sendMessage("You need to do ::starter before using the yell command!");// Stop's Syipkpker's Ftw
        } else {
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName + " - "
                    + command.substring(5);
        }[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Yell while muted. need help. please!

item.title: Yell while muted. need help. please!
item.dc:creator: @Envion Envion
item.description:
@Envion wrote:

John459:

Change your yell command to not allow people to yell while muted.

gtfo

In pseudocode, wrap the contents of your yell command with something along the lines of:

if(player.someMuteVariable == true) { // this will need modification dependant upon how you store player chat privileges player.sendMessage("You can't yell whilst muted."); // Let them know why we're not processing their request } else { // ... yell code here ... }

Read full topic
item.source: Yell while muted. need help. please!
